class.name: InputEventJoypadHat
class.brief_description: Represents hat inputs from a joypad.
class.description: Stores information about joystick hat inputs. One [InputEventJoypadHat] represents one hat at a time. This event is only emitted when raw input is enabled for a given joystick; see [Input.set_joy_raw].

members.member: Current position of the given hat. The value is one of or a bitwise combination of the [enum HatMask] hat direction masks.
